subject: Golf
Solheim Cup (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Lexi Thompson, who became the youngest golfer by almost two years to win an L.P.G.A. Tour event, cannot participate in events like the Solheim Cup because golfers must be at least 18 to be eligible for L.P.G.A. membership.
snippet: Lexi Thompson, who became the youngest golfer by almost two years to win an L.P.G.A. Tour event, cannot participate in events like the Solheim Cup because golfers must be at least 18 to be eligible for L.P.G.A. membership.
